doc:
Perry King https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perry_King 0 Perry Firestone King (born April 30, 1948) is an American actor. He is best known for his role in the television series Riptide (1984–1986). King received a Golden Globe nomination for his role in the television film The Hasty Heart (1983), which is a remake of the 1949 film of the same name. Perry_Firestone_King ( born April_30_,_1948 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_role in the_television_series_Riptide_(_1984 – 1986_) . King received a_Golden_Globe_nomination for his_role in the_television_film The_Hasty_Heart_(_1983_) , which is a_remake of the_1949_film of the_same_name .
